amendment.description: Amendment sought to continue the USDA's Hunger-Free Communities grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to continue USDA's Hunger-Free Communities grant program, which ha s been included in the Senate Farm Bill. The program was created to foster collaborative public-private partnership efforts at the community level to root out and address the causes of hunger and help increase community access to nutritious foods.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.
